thread.title: Allow teachers a common sense approach to holidays (LGA - Local Government Association)
thread.title_full: Allow teachers a common sense approach to holidays (LGA - Local Government Association) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Allow teachers a common sense approach to holidays (LGA - Local Government Association)
text: ( Source : LGA - Local Government Association ) LGA media release 21 October 2015 A reasonable, common sense approach to term time holidays should be allowed, council leaders said today. With the October half term set to start next week
